Master Gobie: Our life was certainly simpler before we left our island. Trying to understand this confusion and complexity is enough to give me a constant headache! What it tells us, though, is that we must all be more careful in our conduct. I suspect that our superiors have not told us everything... Ah, but we are soldiers; it is our task to obey orders, not to question them. Speaking of that, I have more orders for you... Deliver this report to Kamael Master Sione in Gludin Village.
